memnet.from sentence: memnet is an end - toend memory network .

classifies.from sentence: cLSTM 4 classifies utterances using neighboring utterances ( of same speaker ) as context .

TFN.from sentence: TFN 5 models intra-and intermodality dynamics by explicitly aggregating uni - , bi- and trimodal interactions .

MFN.from sentence: MFN performs multi-view learning by using Delta - memory Attention Network , a fusion mechanism to learn cross - view interactions .

CMN models.from sentence: CMN models separate contexts for both speaker and listener to an utterance .
